reviewText: Love it.  It's also very informative about habits that are really annoying - but to both sexes....Some fit one sex or the other more, but all the habits they point out should be on your "never do" list.  AND it's a really good chick flick
If you like Matthew McConaughey, then you'll like this bundle :)

These are all fun no brainer entertainment starring Matthew McConaughey before he started acting in some the more serious fare after he moved into his 40's and beyond.  This set includes four of the romantic comedies he made where he always seemed to be shirtless and a player.  All of the films are enjoyable.  My favorite is the "Failure to Launch".  My least favorite is "Fool's Gold" as it's a little silly, but still watchable with great sun baked paradise scenery.  This set had the DVD's stacked on top of one another which I don't like.  I ended up having to transfer the discs to an empty four DVD case so that they have their own compartments.  I bought this set when it was marked down to $6, so it was worth it to have this at $2 a movie.  Definite steal.
just replacing movies lost in the fire
just as expected.  love these movies
Great combo pack. Love all these movies.
I enjoyed all of  the movies. I love watching Matthew in all his films.
This is a fun set of movies.  All slightly different for the actors.  I loved all of them, and will watch them again and again.

I can only speak for how to lose a guy in 10 days and failure to launch. Both are awesome movies and are exceptionally funny. My parents Luke fools gold but I haven't watched it. However all these movie for such a low price was amazing. Both the movies I watched are funny and great.

Puh-leeze: Matthew McConaughey! Need I really say more???????

Well, ok, then! I LOVE that this was not a single multi-movie DVD, but it is 4 separate, clearly labeled disks.

If you do not like Chick Flicks - skip this one, but if you do, this is for you!!!!! ALSO - I will say that my hubby seemed to enjoy Fools' Gold and Failure to Launch (and Terry Bradshaw and Kathy Bates ROCKED in that one as well!).

THIS WAS A GREAT DEAL!

I enjoyed 3 of the 4 movies but I'm not one for blood and in the first 15 minutes or so someone gets shot in the food and another in the ear. So, "Fouls Gold" took a bit getting used to but I finally made it through it and it "ok" but it for sure brought my grade down a bit for the package..
I received in a timely manner and in excellent condition. Have watched them all multiple times and enjoyed them all!
A very fun, feel good, laugh out loud Matthew fest!! All films are good quality so order, kick back & enjoy the popcorn with a friend!!!
